column4: i heard about this program that completely fixes all your mp3. tags automatically i think i read about it in a linux magazine....ring any bells?

i dont know you know how some tags are just all out of wack? like in exaile/armorock for instance theres about 10 folders with jay z...when there should only be one it doesnt seam like i can edit it through exaile
easytag can tag based on filename (parsing it) and can do the oposite move files around based on tags
